project1.title: EVENTA — Event Management Platform
project1.description: EVENTA is an end-to-end event management platform designed to handle the entire event lifecycle, from event creation and attendee registration to on-site verification in real-time.
project1.section1Desc: Using Laravel 12 as the core engine and React + Inertia for a seamless UI experience.
project1.section1Li1: Dynamic event CRUD with support for multi-session (EventSession).
project1.section1Li2: Customize event themes (logo and color) to organizer needs.
project1.section1Li3: Structured registration flow with per-session participant data storage.
project1.section2Desc: Advanced verification system to minimize queues and increase ticket security.
project1.section2Li1: Automatic digital ticket creation with unique registration codes and QR Codes.
project1.section2Li3: Real-time QR verification engine for Admin to update attendance status instantly.
project1.section3Desc: A control center that provides insights to event organizers.
project1.section3Li1: Analytics dashboard to monitor registration statistics and attendance rates per event.
project1.section3Li3: API protection using Laravel Sanctum for transactional data security.

project2.title: Hotel Reservation System
project2.description: In this project I acted as Project Leader managing a 3-person team. We built a Java desktop application for hotel reservation management with a solid OOP architecture and received an A grade.
project2.feature1: Implementation of MVC architecture (Model-View-Controller) and DAO pattern.
project2.feature2: Integration of JDBC/MySQL for CRUD operations on guests and rooms in real-time.
project2.feature3: Custom Table Model with dynamic search features.
project2.feature4: Team task management based on each member's expertise for maximum efficiency.

project3.title: KripKrip Encryption Tool
project3.description: KripKrip is a web-based encryption application designed to add an extra layer of security to digital data. This project was developed as a university assignment focusing on securing information through efficient text and image encryption methods. Using FastAPI in the backend and React in the frontend, the app delivers fast performance for processing complex cryptographic algorithms.
project3.feature1: Text & Image Encryption: Convert messages and images into encrypted formats
project3.feature2: Implementation of Standard Algorithms: Use strong algorithms like AES-256 and DES
project3.feature3: Modern Architecture: FastAPI backend and React frontend
project3.feature4: End-to-End Data Security: Designed for academic cryptography use cases
